REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0279 reute r f BC-FISHER-TRANSPORTATION 03-06 0069

TEXT.TITLE: FISHER TRANSPORTATION FILES FOR INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: <Fisher Transportation Services Inc> said it has filed for an initial public offering of 1,100,000 common shares at an expected price of six to seven dlrs a share through underwriters led by Laidlaw Adams and Peck Inc. Fisher is an irregular route truckload quantity general commodity carrier operating throughout the continental U.S. Reuter
